opis: Posredujemo u prodaji prekrasne kuće smještene u blizini mora u Stobreču. Ova nekretnina obuhvaća prizemlje, dva kata i potkrovlje, a unutar kuće nalaze se apartmani i sobe prilagođene turističkom najmu te stan u potkrovlju. Kuća je kategorizirana i svake godine ostvaruje izvrsne prihode. Lokacija je izvanredna, u blizini plaža, škole, vrtića i centra Stobreča, kao i Duilova u Splitu. Iskoristite ovu jedinstvenu priliku i investirajte u ovu prekrasnu kuću koja je idealna za obiteljski život, turistički najam ili kombinaciju oboje. Za više informacija javite nam se na 0991600400 (Josipa). Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani ugovor o posredovanju, a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju i prometu nekretnina. ENG: We are facilitating the sale of a beautiful house located near the sea in Stobreč. This property consists of a ground floor, two additional floors, and an attic. Inside the house, there are apartments and rooms designed for tourist rental, as well as a flat in the attic. The house is categorized and generates excellent income every year. The location is exceptional, close to beaches, schools, kindergartens, and the center of Stobreč, as well as Duilovo in Split. Take advantage of this unique opportunity to invest in this beautiful house, ideal for family living, tourist rental, or a combination of both. For more information, please contact us at +385 99 160 0400 (Josipa). Viewing of the property is possible only with a signed mediation agreement, in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act.
adresa_agencije: Adresa:ulica Domovinskog rata 60, 21000 Split, Splitsko-dalmatinska, Hrvatska
